definition: to whisper in sb's ear/a whisper

sentences.english: He whispered something in the old man's ears to jog his memory.
sentences.chinese: 他向那位老人耳語了幾句，以喚起他的回憶。

sentences.english: I see unquiet ghosts and speak their whispered tongue.
sentences.chinese: 我看見動盪的鬼魂和他們低聲的耳語。

sentences.english: Warm breath, light whisper, tender semi-tone.
sentences.chinese: 熱烈的呼吸，溫柔的低音，耳語。

sentences.english: Even the lowest whisper can be heard ---- over arm voice … when it's telling the truth.
sentences.chinese: 最低聲的耳語也能超越戰火，只要它傳遞的是真相。

sentences.english: They spoke in whispers lest they should be heard.
sentences.chinese: 他們低聲耳語惟恐被人聽見。

sentences.english: They were the whispers in the wind and the shiver down your spine.
sentences.chinese: 他們是風的耳語和那打顫下來你的背骨。

sentences.english: Not a whisper, not a thought.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕是一聲耳語，一個念想。

sentences.english: Some girls smiled and whispered with each other.
sentences.chinese: 一些女孩子笑起來並互相耳語。

sentences.english: God whispers into some men's ears. Well, he shouts into mine!
sentences.chinese: 上帝對凡人耳語，卻對我狂嘯。

sentences.english: Have to whisper into his hand to report.
sentences.chinese: 有手下入來向他耳語彙報情況。

sentences.english: Its whisperings had the hoarse accent of a vibration.
sentences.chinese: 他們的耳語有如風雨聲。

sentences.english: Come here, Lanie, let me whisper in your ear.
sentences.chinese: 到這兒來，拉妮，讓我用耳語告訴你。

sentences.english: "Six, " said Johnsy, in almost a whisper. "They're falling faster now.
sentences.chinese: 瓊西幾乎用耳語低聲說道，“它們現在越落越快了。

sentences.english: They shook hands and he whispered to the pastor.
sentences.chinese: 在握了握手之後，他便在牧師耳根小聲耳語着什麼。

sentences.english: One of them drew aside the captain of the guard, and in a low voice whispered to him.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個將侍衛首領拉到一邊，低聲耳語。

definition: to float/to hover/also written 漂浮
to echo one another/to respond (in agreement)
to recount/to tell of/to relate/(fig.) (of a thing) to stand as testament to (some past history)
singing voice/fig. original voice of a poet
to recount/to narrate/to give an account of
talking in one's sleep/delirious ravings/nonsense/sheer fantasy
